title: kADu malaiyellAm
sahitya:
kADu malaiyellAm tEDiyunnai aDaindEn kanaka sabhai duraiyE dhIran kuraiyaik-


anupallavi

  vIDugaLai vaLaittum EdugaLait-tuLaittum vittagaraip-paNindum cittamm aDangAmal


caraNam    mulaivaLar mAdarai munnE kaNDanjinEn mUkkai piDittukkoNDOr muzhaiyilE tunjinEn
alaiyum manattai innum nilanirutta vilaiyEn haranE unnarulinri tiran Edenakkini mEl
